#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(int argc, const char * argv[]) {
  int T;
  cin>>T;
  while (T--) {
    int N,C;
    cin>>N>>C;
    
    unsigned long int num =0;
    int inputNum;
    for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {
      cin>>inputNum;
      num+=inputNum;
    }
    if (num>C) {
      cout<<"No"<<endl;
    } else {
      cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
    }
    
  }
  return 0;
}
